comments.html: Let's just remove your responders antiquated IP address and see how many more replies they get put into Twitter.
comments.name: Marc

comments.html:
"Exposure to Nexus 7000 conversation learning (in particular after configuring SVI interfaces) is an added bonus. "

Can someone elaborate on this? I am new to a nexus 7k environment and this seemed to trigger a reaction to something I've seen in this environment.
